title: Amazon Takes Over Popular Franchise From Netflix
description:
It looks like Netflix is losing a popular action franchise to Amazon. This comes after Netflix spent as much as $30 million to try and create a new installment in said franchise. A new report reveals that “Amazon MGM Studios is in serious talks to mount a live-action ‘Masters of the Universe‘ movie from Adam [...]

The post Amazon Takes Over Popular Franchise From Netflix appeared first on ScreenGeek.
